plot: A guitar twanged folk tale of a young trucker named Slim who is learning the ropes of the trucking business, thanks to the help of a few nefarious truck stop personalities.
title: Slim
plot_es: A guitar twanged folk tale of a young trucker named Slim who is learning the ropes of the trucking business, thanks to the help of a few nefarious truck stop personalities.
plot_en: A guitar twanged folk tale of a young trucker named Slim who is learning the ropes of the trucking business, thanks to the help of a few nefarious truck stop personalities.
